alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 12:18AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Texas, southeastern Cimarron, northwestern Sherman, eastern Dallam and central Hartley Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1218 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Griggs to 15 miles northeast of Romero. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Stratford, Hartley, Griggs and Conlen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
